meanings.definition: The quality or state of being welcome.
meanings.sent1: The welcomenesses of the party made everyone feel happy.
meanings.sent2: I felt a sense of welcomenesses when I entered the cozy cafe.
meanings.sent3: The welcomenesses of the new puppy was evident in its wagging tail.
meanings.sent4: The welcomenesses of the sun after a long winter was like a warm embrace.
meanings.sent5: The welcomenesses of the kind gesture lingered in my heart for days.

meanings.definition: The feeling of being welcome or accepted.
meanings.sent1: Her face lit up with welcomenesses when she saw her old friend.
meanings.sent2: The welcomenesses in the room put me at ease instantly.
meanings.sent3: The welcomenesses of the surprise party brought tears to her eyes.
meanings.sent4: The welcomenesses in the air was palpable as the family reunited.
meanings.sent5: The welcomenesses of the community made him feel like he belonged.

meanings.definition: The act of greeting someone in a friendly or hospitable manner.
meanings.sent1: His welcomenesses at the door made me feel instantly at home.
meanings.sent2: The welcomenesses of the host made the guests feel appreciated.
meanings.sent3: The cat showed welcomenesses by purring and rubbing against the visitor.
meanings.sent4: The welcomenesses of the handshake was warm and genuine.
meanings.sent5: The welcomenesses of the small town was evident in the smiles of the residents.
